content:
ProPGF Batch 1: Retrospective The first Filecoin Public Goods Funding program has successfully concluded, marking a testament to the growing strength, ambition, and collaboration within the Filecoin ecosystem.
Batch 1 Highlights Total Funding Awarded: $3,681,800 Projects Funded: 14 teams Applications Received: 38 projects Projects Shortlisted: 23 projects advanced to final review Focus Areas Batch 1 funded initiatives spanning:
Core infrastructure and developer tooling Data retrieval and content routing services Storage provider implementations and monitoring Real-world asset integration (RWA) Data onboarding platforms SP reputation and analytics tools Programmable deal allocation systems Protocol maintenance and developer experience improvements Notable Projects Funded FIL Ponto ($500,000) - Public goods coordination and chain infrastructure CIDgravity Gateway ($500,000) - Data onboarding platform with S3 compatibility Curio Storage ($500,000) - Filecoin storage provider implementation Filecoin Retrieval Checkers/FilCDN ($500,000) - Retrieval assurance services IPNI ($480,000) - Content routing service linking Filecoin and IPFS Filecoin Developer Tooling (FIL-B) ($400,000) - Protocol maintenance and smart contract tooling Resources Full Batch 1 Announcement
summary:
ProPGF Batch 1: Retrospective

The first Filecoin Public Goods Funding program has successfully concluded, marking a testament to the growing strength, ambition, and collaboration within the Filecoin ecosystem.
title: ProPGF Batch 1

content: The Filecoin Grants operates in batch cycles to ensure focused, impactful grant allocation. Each batch brings new opportunities and priorities aligned with the evolving needs of the Filecoin ecosystem.
summary: The Filecoin Grants operates in batch cycles to ensure focused, impactful grant allocation. Each batch brings new opportunities and priorities aligned with the evolving needs of the Filecoin ecosystem.
title: Grant Batches
